title: 1968 Movie "Bullitt" opening titles font
content:
I just saw this really great Steve McQueen movie called “Bullitt” and wondered if anyone here can help me with the opening titles. I have attached some screenshots.

Btw (and off-topic): Please recommend some more movies like Bullitt, French Connection etc. to me if you’re into this type of film.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typo\_bullit1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_bullit1.jpg) | 11.09 KB |
| [typo\_bullit2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_bullit2.jpg) | 16.96 KB |
| [typo\_bullit3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_bullit3.jpg) | 14.72 KB |

 [‹ (x) Black italic sans in U.S. Honda Fit car commercials - Prosper {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40897 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Eastenders UK soap - Cheltenham {Nick Cooke} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40895 "Go to next forum topic")
author: herr.schuessler

comments.content: I belive this was called “Information Grotesk” it was a film type, I’m not sure if it’s ever been digitized.

_Btw (and off-topic): Please recommend some more movies like Bullitt, French Connection etc. to me if you’re into this type of film._

[Vanishing Point](http://web.archive.org/web/20080118115622/http:/imdb.com/title/tt0067927/) — the original with Barry Newman and Cleavon Little, not the tacky remake with Viggo Mortensen.

Thank you very much! Compacta seems to be a close alternative (the bolder, the better).

<cite>Vanishing Point — the original with Barry Newman and Cleavon Little</cite>  
Great - will see if I can find it. Isn’t that the one they talk about all the time in the new Tarantino?
